title: can not play :(
body: trying to get sum help on getting back on my game????i have never had a problem really ..till now for sum reason cant sign in ???Its not my password or my user name ...i logged in here to send this so????PLZ HELP SOON THKS

replies.body:
I should be able to help, but first I need to know what the exact issue is or what the login error is.

Reply back and let me know!
